pre_caption: This video presents a static, eye-level wide shot of a modern office, viewed through a rectangular opening in a brick wall that occupies the foreground. Initially, the middle ground is arranged with an easel and a desk on the left, a chair and a coffee table in the center, and a leather couch on the right, all set against a dark, paneled back wall. A painting hangs on the right wall. The scene's dynamic is a slow cross-fade; cardboard boxes gradually fade into view across the middle ground, appearing on and around the furniture. Simultaneously, elements like the whiteboard on the easel and the painting on the wall fade out, until the office space is filled with stacked boxes that obscure most of the original furnishings. An overlay with the text '[18]' is visible in the bottom-left corner of the frame throughout the shot.
